About me

I'm a full-stack developer from Singapore. My current interest is in backend development, keen on working with distributed and highly scalable systems. I'm also keen in exploring the field of machine learning and artificial intelligence.

Languages: Java, Javascript, SQL
Frameworks: ReactJS, NodeJS, Spring Boot
Design: TailwindCSS

Copycraft

AI-powered tool using LLM to craft written content such as copies, blogs, ads, and articles. Target users: business owners, marketing agencies, copywriter.

Developed with NextJS, styled with TailwindCSS.

Smart Bino (Facial Recognition Application)

Facial recognition software, with sign-in and register interfaces. Facial recognition ML functionality using Clarifai API.

Front-end developed with React, styled with Tachyons.

Server developed with Node.js.

Database using PostgreSQL.
